snippet.title: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Unravel the mysteries of Kamihama City with this brand new Magical Girl RPG!

Aniplex of America is thrilled to announce the English version of hit mobile game, "Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story," is now available on iOS and Android in the U.S.A. and Canada!

STORY:
The stage is set in a burgeoning city called Kamihama.
Magical Girls are drawn there as if by some mysterious force.
Iroha Tamaki is one of them.
“Hey, Ui…. Why did you disappear?”
A new story about Magical Girls and the wishes that drive them unfolds…

+ For more information, visit the official website at magiarecord-en.com


+ LIKE Magia Record -- English on Facebook at facebook.com/MagiaRecordEN

+ FOLLOW Magia Record on Twitter at twitter.com/MagiaRecordEN
